    public class Superellipse
extends Path

      • translate

        public void translate(float dx,
                      float dy)
        Description copied from interface: IPath
        Shifts this Path dx units in the x-direction and dy units in the y-direction.
        Parameters:
        dx - The number of pixels to shift the path right.
        dy - THe number of pixels to shift the path down.
